info.title: They Do Not Die 2
info.author: ThatOtherPerson
info.details:
They Do Not Die 2 is a top down 2D zombie shooter with distructable walls and four player co op.

Controls:
Nunchuck analog stick = Move
A button = Run
B button = Shoot the machine gun
Left = Shoot the rocket launcher
Down = Shoot the machine gun
Right = Shoot the shot gun
Plus = Pause
Minus = Pause

Author:
ThatOtherPerson (thatotherperson@yahoo.com)
